author: Bobby Campbell
title: Comment on Trump To The Rescue (Limerick) by Bobby Campbell
text: Will the Dem debate generate heat? Will someone go down in defeat? Well if points aren’t scored, And you start to get bored, You can always watch Donald Trump tweet.   October 13th, 2015 at 3:35   Campaign Humor , Democrats Humor , Democrats Satire , Donald Trump , Election Satire , Political   Social Media Satire , Twitter   “Trump To The Rescue (Limerick)” Bobby Campbell
